sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import axios from "axios" import queryString from "query-string"; export function Cakedetails(props) { var cakeimage = "cakelava.jpg" //here we used quersting var query = queryString.parse(props.location.search).q var [cakedetails , setCakedetails] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ let apiurl = "https://apifromashu.herokuapp.com/api/cake/" + query axios( { method:'get', url:apiurl } ).then((response)=>{ console.log("response from cake details api" , response.data) setCakedetails(response.data.data) },(error)=>{ console.log("error from all cakes api" , error) }) }, []) console.log(cakedetails) return ( <>

Ingrediant

  • milk
  • Chocalate
  • egg
  • sugar
  • butter

{cakedetails.name}

{cakedetails.reviews} reviews

{cakedetails.description}

Current Price: {cakedetails.price}
Weight:o.5Kg
Flavour: {cakedetails.flavour}
Occasion: {cakedetails.type}
); }
